title: Frontend Developer & AI Enthusiast
professionalSummary: Passionate frontend developer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Specialized in React, TypeScript, and modern AI-driven development tools. Committed to creating user-centric solutions that bridge technology and human experience.

achievements: Led development of a React-based dashboard serving 10,000+ daily users
Improved application performance by 40% through code optimization

Successfully delivered 15+ projects on time and within budget
Developed 20+ responsive web applications using React and Vue.js
Reduced page load times by 35% through performance optimization
Implemented automated testing suites with 90% code coverage
Worked closely with UX designers to improve user experience metrics
Maintained legacy codebases and migrated to modern frameworks
Built and maintained company website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Contributed to 10+ client projects with diverse technical requirements
Learned React and modern development practices through hands-on experience
Participated in code reviews and agile development processes

projects.name: AI-Powered Portfolio Generator
